disk

Class INode

  • java.lang.Object
    • disk.INode

  • public class INode
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that represents an INode.
    Author:
    Jose Antonio Rodriguez Rivera

    • Constructor Detail

      • INode

        public INode()
        Creates an INode.

      • INode

        public INode(int firstBlock,
             int size,
             byte type)
        Creates an INode with some properties.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of file (0 for a data file, 1 for a directory)
        size - the size of the file pointed at by the INode
        firstBlock - the first block where the file/directory is located
        positionInDisk - the location on the disk of this INode

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the type of the INode.
        Returns:
        0 if pointing at a data file, 1 if pointing at a directory

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the file pointed at by the INode.
        Returns:
        the size of the file/directory

      • getFirstBlock

        public int getFirstBlock()
        Returns the number of the first block of the file/directory
        Returns:
        the number of the first block

      • setFirstBlock

        public void setFirstBlock(int fb)
        Sets the first block of this INode.
        Parameters:
        fb - the block number to point to

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int size)
        Sets the size of the file(or directory) represented by this INode.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the target block

      • setType

        public void setType(byte b)
        Sets the type of the target of the INode.
